content: Need 80$ loan for some personal purpose. Collateral: noneRepayment: 90$ in 2weeks ( probably before 24th december)Pm for address (usdt trc20 preferred).

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on December 09, 2022, 05:50:10 AMNeed 80$ loan for some personal purpose. Collateral: noneRepayment: 90$ in 2weeks ( probably before 24th december)Pm for address (usdt trc20 preferred).As you have joined the signature campaign, I can fund your loan. If you want to take it, post on my thread or send your trc20 wallet id to me. I will use trc20 while 0.8$ transaction fee will be deducted from you. Hope it will not be a big problem for you, thank you.
